page.title: 10INDUSTRY (continued)
page.content:
Halesowen Fire Station.
The station,on the Hagley Road was built in 1963.28 trained men work shifts of 9 or 15 hours using the two Halesowen engines.In 1984,766 calls reached the station,not all fires,false alarms,road accidents,cats in trees etc. ______________________________________ The Dutch Oven Bakery.
The bakery is an old car showroom, which if left unoccupied may have been cleared for housing.It employs 25 people,10 on each shift,making confectionary and bread.It supplies shops in the Dudley area.It opened in 1979 and moved to this site in 1983.
